name: Uthred - Ball vs Hole
description: Let the ball thread between the holes. Improve your concentration and judgment. Very challenging. This game is fun but not simple, Drawing the perfect arc with the fewest number of jumps is a symbol of superb skill. As the level increases, the dimension and mass of the ball increase, and complex and varied terrain, Getting a high score is definitely a challenge! The game includes a training mode that allows you to master the skills in the shortest time. This is a lightweight and elegant game, Try it out!
